user.title: Microsoft Family Safety Authentication
user.description:
To authenticate with Microsoft Family Safety, follow these steps:

1. Click on this URL: {auth_url}
2. Log in with your Microsoft account
3. After successful login, you will be redirected to a blank page
4. Copy the entire URL from your browser's address bar
5. Extract the token from the URL (it's the value after 'access_token=')
6. Click Next to enter the token

token.title: Enter Authentication Token

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Microsoft Family Safety
reauth_confirm.description:
Your authentication token has expired. Please obtain a new token:

1. Click on this URL: {auth_url}
2. Log in with your Microsoft account
3. Copy the URL after redirect and extract the token
4. Enter the new token below

error.auth_failed: Authentication failed. Please check your token and try again.
error.token_expired: Your authentication token has expired. Please reauthenticate.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
